modules.name: TimeDiktat
modules.description: Clock Gen based on JW clock

modules.name: PitchIntegrator
modules.description: Sequential switch  based on ML switches, with sample and hold designed for pitch

modules.name: BurstIntegrator
modules.description: Sequential switch based on ML switches, with trigger generator to add burst of trigs to yout patterns

modules.name: QuadModulator
modules.description: Quad synced LFO with skew from ramp up to ramp down through sine plus dual unity mixer

modules.name: ImpulseControl
modules.description: Trigger sequencer based on Fundamental SEQ3

modules.name: PercussiveVibration
modules.description: Synth voice based on 21Khz PalmLoop and Befaco Rampage mainly for drums

modules.name: AdditiveVibration
modules.description: Additive/FM synth voice based on 21Khz PalmLoop and Befaco Rampage

modules.name: ComplexOsc
modules.description: Complex Oscillator made with 2 phase modulatable sines plus a clipper

modules.name: Driftgen
modules.description: CV modifier, will add subtle drift to V/Oct signals
